CE0001.title: Tutorial
CE0001.description:
Welcome in a new advance cyber trainer platform.

In your first case you will have to investigate on commons employees behaviours.
It turned out that some of them do not have a safe behaviour...

Find all action that can cause a cyber security breach!
CE0001.welcome_message:
Welcome in your first case!

I'm your AI assistent and I will help you during your case ...

emails.content:
In this section you can see all the email received by the character.

Be careful to all email details!

calls.content:
All character incoming calls are stored in this section.

Will there be any unusual calls?

chats.content:
In this section you can see all the character chat conversations.

Pay attenction on each message content and the sender!

history.content:
All sites and file downloaded aby the character are stored in this section.

Will all be lawful? Pay attection to eact detail!

CE0002.title: E-company
CE0002.description:
You have been assigned to your first case!

You will have to investigate on the E-company employees.
It turned out that some of them do not have a safe behaviour...

Find all action that can cause a cyber security breach!
